string.text: Do you sell Ammunition?
I only sell cartridges for the M-134 minigun, which are hard to find!!
How much do they cost?
2500ru per box and a Medusa artefact.
That's pretty expensive, don't you think!?
That's the price, take it, or, leave it.
Fine! Here.
Forget it!!!
Do you have any unique weapons?
I can provide you with a Sniper Rifle with a Computerized Scope, but, it's not cheap!
How much?
120,000ru as well as a Pudding artefact.
Must be one hell of a Rifle!!
Indeed it is, a very fine weapon!
You've got yourself a deal.
I don't have that kind of money, maybe later.
Do you sell any unique items?
I can sell you a coded lock, great for keeping stashes safe!!
Is theft a big problem here in the Zone?
It is just as bad here as it is anywhere else, ONLY WORSE!!
How much does this lock cost?
20,000ru plus a Quirk artefact for a single lock
Ok, I'll take one lock then.
Sorry, not interested.
